DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect daily use Naproxen ( commonly use over-the-counter NSAID ) physical performance athlete , measure maximum oxygen consumption .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age equal great than18 year age 2 . No history allergy adverse reaction NSAID 3 . No use NSAID past 2 week 4 . No history peptic ulcer disease ( PUD ) , gastroesophageal disease ( GERD ) , gastritis 5 . No major medical history include limited diabetes , hypertension , asthma , kidney disease coronary artery disease 6 . Currently take medication include oral contraceptive 1 . Age < 18 year age 2 . History allergy adverse reaction NSAID 3 . Use NSAID past 2 week 4 . History bleed disorder 5 . History PUD , GERD , gastritis 6 . Pregnant 7 . A medical history diabetes , hypertension , asthma , kidney disease coronary artery disease 8 . Taking medication include oral contraceptive
